security: If AMULLA-1 ASSERTIONS VALID, IT QUITE APPARENT HIS FUTURE 10 SUCH MATERIAL AND PERKAPS TOUCH ITSELF MAY BE JEOPARDIZED. THEREFORE, WAVE PLANS TO PLACE SECRET NOFORN CONTINU CONTROL RESTRICTIONS ALL MATERIAL OBTAINED FROM POUCH BY AMULLA-1.
summary: A cable from JMWAVE regarding concerns about AMBUD-1's interest in how copies of letters from Jose Ignacio Rasco and Dr. Rafael Aguirre were obtained, and the potential risk to AMULLA-1. JMWAVE plans to implement SECRET NOFORN controls on materials from AMULLA-1 to protect their future and the source itself.
summary_one_paragraph: This cable from JMWAVE, dated June 12, 1961, addresses concerns that AMBUD-1 displayed undue interest and dismay regarding how PBPRINTERS quickly obtained copies of letters sent by Jose Ignacio Rasco and Dr. Rafael Aguirre (addressed to Lucas Moran), which were provided by AMULLA-1. The cable notes that AMULLA-1's future access to such material could be jeopardized. To mitigate this risk, JMWAVE intends to impose SECRET NOFORN control restrictions on all material obtained from AMULLA-1, ensuring sensitive information remains protected.
title: IN 3367: Concerns Regarding AMBUD-1 Interest and Protection of AMULLA-1
